resources.string: The first video:\n According to the content of the prompt, please complete the recording of the verification video. You will be asked to film your ID during the record, so be sure to have your ID in advance for your primary verification.

You can start trading in all and Fiat: the total daily sales can not exceed %1$s, and the single transaction amount can not exceed %2$s. If you want to increase the transaction quota, please complete the advanced identity verification.
As for some ads, merchants may be required to complete the advanced identity verification first to trade then
Advanced identity verification failed. Please try again
The video recording will be performed soon. Please ensure that the data or WIFI is working smoothly. Otherwise, the video upload may fail, you need to re-record the video.
The video is divided into 2 parts. The total length of the 2 videos is 2 minutes. The total size is less than 100M. Please arrange the time for recording each video.
After each video recording is completed, you can play this video to check its clarity. If you are not satisfied with the video, you can re-record this part.

According to the content of the prompt, please complete the recording of the verification video. You will be asked to film your ID during the record, so be sure to have your ID in advance for your primary verification.

1. Please keep your face in the center of the video, and read the text of the prompt. Glasses is allowed to wear.
2. No need to hold any ID.
3. The total duration should not exceed 2 minutes.
4, Video upload for data and network traffic requirements are high. It is expected to cost you 20M.

Prompt\nI (%1$s), ID card number (%2$s). I’m willing to register and trade on CoinW and guarantee that the account is for personal use. My source of funds is legal and reliable, and I am willing to trade digital assets such as Bitcoin all by myself. I fully understand the digital currency and the potential risks, and I have the ability to resist risks and agree to bear all risks. I swear that I will not use the digital assets for illegal purpose, and conduct any illegal activity on CoinW, such as money laundering, pyramid schemes, and illegal exchange of legal money.
The video duration exceeds 2 minutes, please re-record
